title: sunnybay
author: sunnybay
created_time: October 04, 2022, 12:26:21 PMLast edit: October 05, 2022, 06:48:30 AM by sunnybay
content: WEM team are super excited to inform the crypto-enthusiast community that today we are officially launching our project calledWorld Eco Money, based on WEM blockchain technology backed by World Eco Money Foundation.Our state-of-the-art consensus protocol called WEMNIT (WEM Near Instant Transactions) based on theDelegated Proof of Stake protocol, which makes the WEM blockchain very fast..It allows us to create a native Layer 1 WEM coin that can be used for multiple applications,such as local and international payments and trade settlements.This project started about 2 years ago, in the year 2020. Since then,we have come a long way in developing and improving our blockchain.We cordially invite anyone interested in this project to join us.https://worldecomoney.comMark: support@worldecomoney.com
